content.text:
# 2010 Czech Lion Awards

| best_picture                   = Walking Too Fast
| best_actor                     = Ondřej Malý
| best_actor_film                = Walking Too Fast
| best_supporting_actor          = Vladimír Dlouhý
| best_supporting_actor_film     = Kajínek
| best_actress                   = Zuzana Bydžovská
| best_actress_film              = Mamas & Papas
| best_supporting_actress        = Eliška Balzerová
| best_supporting_actress_film   = Women in Temptation
| most_wins                      = Walking Too Fast (5)
| network                        = Česká televize
| most_nominations               = Walking Too Fast (13)
| duration                       =
| ratings                        =
| last                           = 2009
| next                           = 2011
}}
2010 Czech Lion Awards ceremony was held on 5 March 2011.
Winners and nominees
{| class=wikitable
|-
! style="background:#BDB76B; width: 50%" | Best Film
! style="background:#BDB76B; width: 50%" | Best Director
|-
| valign="top"|
* Walking Too Fast
** Habermann
** Kooky
** Largest of the Czechs
** Identity Card
| valign="top"|

**Jan Svěrák – Kooky
**Robert Sedláček – Largest of the Czechs
**Ondřej Trojan – Identity Card
**Jan Švankmajer – Surviving Life
|-
